EmailTemplate.description: To be sent to whom wishes to order IATA publications
EmailTemplate.name: SCE-EN IATA PUBLICATIONS ORDER
EmailTemplate.subject: IATA Publications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
All IATA publications are available for purchase online at www.iataonline.com.
In case you cannot find your product, please contact custserv@iata.org.
Should you need further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to login a new query via our Customer Portal: www.iata.com/europe/cs. These queries will be answered with the highest priority.
Yours Sincerely
{!Case.OwnerFullName} Service Centre Europe International Air Transport Association www.iata.org/europe/cs
